name: fmihel-ajax-plugin-session
description: client side for ajax plugin session

scripts.npm-publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.npm-publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.npm-publish-major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.npm-publish-beta: npm run build && npm publish  --tag beta
scripts.git-push: git push origin main && git push origin main --tag
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run build-dist-min

author: fmihel76@gmail.com
